body:
Hi everyone! :D

So lately i have been playing this game in Steam called Counter Strike Global Offensive (CS:GO). Its a very fun, tactical team/teamwork based FPS game that is being played professionally by pro teams at a tournament now with a prize pool of $250,000(usd i believe).

So any way, i was just wonering if anyone else played it? To you play MatchMaking comp? What is your *rank? And are you interested in playing with me?

*The CSGO ranking system is extremely important to me, as i think we need people of a similiar skill level, as apose to one person that carries the team, or one person that is a bit slow on the calls, rotates ect.

my current rank is only Silver Elite Master so i am looking for people of roughly Silver Elile/Gold Nova 1. If you have absloutly no idea what i am talking about, go to your web browser of choice and type into the images section "CS:GO Ranks", and that should give you a rough idea of what to expect.

So, then i began to wonder if Avicus could have a CS:GO team, or if that was too big of a dream... We would just need basically the Avicus Logo as a picture thingy and possibly a TeamSpeak server...

If anyone is interested please respond here, or if you need any more information/help please... Leave a reply here...

Have a great day/night depending on where you are, hope to see afew responses by tommorrow.

PLEASE NOTE: I am in Australia, and would much rather have Aus players rather than EU/US players, just because of connection problems.

if this is breaking the rules in what ever way shape or form please kindly remove it or what ever :) thank you

replies.body:
I've got it, on my alt I got Gold Nova and on my new I got Silver 2, I didnt play competitive till 2 days ago on my new account (Im aiming for Master Guardian by a month at least! ).

A CSGO team would be great, since I know a few avicus players that have it.

Btw I had a m4a4 asiimov field tested and and this guy is willing to give me  stat-trak m4a1-s atomic alloy factory new :O

Add me Through steam my name is mepanda2, it should come up with ZERO-TICK
This is my new one, so it is really bad, even if I have alot of playtime, since i thought I would not get a alt!
